div.p: Voting empowers every Idahoan to help shape the direction of our communities and State. VoteIdaho.gov is more than a website; it’s your passport to participation. Seamlessly navigate the path to civic engagement, from registering to casting your vote or even stepping up as a candidate. Your journey begins here, because every voice matters, every vote counts. Let’s shape the future of Idaho together.

p.strong: Phil McGrane, Idaho Secretary of State
